data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Morobe that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Morobe, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Morobe, Papua New Guinea with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 674,800 people living in Morobe through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Morobe who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Morobe, Papua New Guinea, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Morobe, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Morobe, Papua New Guinea has a population of 674,800.

We estimate Morobe has 155,151 people who might know Jesus, 481,727 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,922 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Morobe, Papua New Guinea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Morobe
location.people_groups_list: Pulabu, Bemal, Angave, Mari, Hop, Mataru
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pulabu (300), Bemal (3,000), Angave (3,900), Mari, Hop (1,400), Mataru (1,600)
